participant_1.background:
I like to wear dark, comfortable clothing that fits well.
my favorite band is the muggers.
I love fresh seafood and vegetables from the Pacific Northwest.
I used to race cars, but now I prefer to spend my time reading and writing.
music has always been my number one passion.

participant_2.background:
I love my laptop because it keeps me connected to the world when I'm on the go.
I enjoy mushroom ravioli with my doberman.
i am a weight lifter.
i know how to drive a stickshift.
i have ink stains on all my shirts.

content.text: Hi there! What are your favorite hobbies?
Hi! I like to lift weights, run, and play with my dog.
Nice! I used to race cars, but now I prefer to spend my time reading and writing.
I love reading as well! What genres do you like?
I like to read a variety of genres, but I'm really into historical fiction and thrillers. What about you?
I like to read mostly fiction, but I also enjoy some nonfiction. I love to learn about new things.
That's great! I love learning new things too. What are some of your favorite books?
I really enjoyed The Martian, and I'm also a big fan of the Outlander series.
I've heard good things about The Martian, but I haven't read it yet. I'll have to check it out. I've never heard of the Outlander series, but I'll look into it.
You won't be disappointed! It's a great series.
Good to know! Thanks for the recommendation.
